tool_description: Validates product data quality by checking required fields, data formats, and identifying potential issues before classification processing.

product_data.description: Array of product identifiers or data records to validate

required_fields.description: List of required field names for validation

strict_mode.description: Whether to enforce strict validation rules

error_messages: Empty product data: At least one product record must be provided for validation
Invalid required fields: Required fields list cannot be empty
Data format error: Product data must be in the expected format with proper field types
usage: Provide product_data and required_fields, optionally set strict_mode. The tool returns validation results and identifies data quality issues.

valid_products.description: Number of products that passed validation

invalid_products.description: Number of products that failed validation
